codes.script:
turnGun(90)

onRepeat = function()
  move(20)
  fire(3)
end

onHitWall = function()
  turn(90)
  turnGun(90)
end

codes.script:
onRepeat = function()
  turn(10)
  turnGun((-10))
  fire(1)
end
